body.p: The within petitioner J T. Merimee is the same person who sent a petition to you on the same subject about first of April last. I called at the secretaries office and the former paper was mislaid and Mr Page could not find any memorandum of it. I think the case presents strong considerations for Executive clemency -- Merrimee was a licensed barkeeper at the time --
